Welcome to Ontology of Esperanto Project pages!
===============================================

|The Tower of Babel|

*The Tower of Babel, Pieter Bruegel the Elder, 1563*

Ontology of Esperanto is a research project performed in 2006 by Epistematica.

**Table of contents**

   ontology
   paper

- `Project's repository on GitHub <https://github.com/Epistematica/esperanto-ontology>`__
